class.name: JarVoxelChunk
class.description: Represents a single chunk of the terrain. Instances of this class are duplicated by [JarVoxelTerrain] for each chunk generated. It manages the [CollisionShape3D] and [MeshInstance3D] nodes for collision and rendering. The main node structure is based on a [StaticBody3D], with these elements as children.

members.member: LOD level at which the [CollisionShape3D] is active.
The [CollisionShape3D] instance used by the chunk.
The [MeshInstance3D] instance used by the chunk.
The [StaticBody3D] instance serving as the root node for the chunk.
